AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant identified as the person motioning for aliens to hide, wore white clothing and a blinking cellular Bluetooth Device during the incident, argued against conspiracy conviction, and was convicted of alien transportation offenses, seeking a reduction in offense level due to minimal or minor participation, denied § 3B1.2 request
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: individual allegedly transporting aliens with McMillon, stopped at an empty parking lot where aliens were waiting, co-conspirator in the case, testified against McMillon at sentencing, gave consent to open the door during the incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Government agent narrating the checkpoint stop, testified about the events during the trial, asked Williams to open the door and secured a position next to him as a show of authority
